thread.title: TV JAPAN offers 2-week Fall Free Preview starting 10/15
thread.title_full: TV JAPAN offers 2-week Fall Free Preview starting 10/15 - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: TV JAPAN offers 2-week Fall Free Preview starting 10/15
text:
Information contained on this page is provided by an independent third-party content provider. WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith. If you have any questions or comments about this page please contact pressreleases@worldnow.com .
SOURCE International Media Distribution
Open signal for customers to sample new Japanese fall programming in participating systems
CENTENNIAL, Colo. , Oct. 15, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- International Media Distribution (IMD), the award-winning provider of in-language television programming today announced the list of US operators participating in this year's TV JAPAN Free Preview October 15-31 . During this promotional window, customers of major carriers such as AT&T, Comcast, Cox, Time Warner Cable and Verizon will be able to view the #1 global Japanese language channel without a subscription for a limited time.
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151015/277248
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151015/277249LOGO
"This year, we are making a special effort to reach out to female consumers, " said Kenichiro Takiguchi , President & CEO at TV JAPAN . "TV JAPAN has a slate of new programming with strong female lead characters and we want to highlight the importance of women in Japanese households with this campaign. TV JAPAN truly is a channel for all Japanese language speakers and their families and we hope this free preview helps connect consumers to their heritage by experiencing the richness of TV JAPAN ."
This fall free preview coincides with the television premiere season in Japan so that American audiences can see what they are missing on TV JAPAN . Highlights include:
New Dramas:
"Dr. STORKS ", "Liquid," "Downtown Rocket," "The Memorandum of Kyoko Okitegami," "AIBOU: Tokyo Detective Duo (Partners) Season 14" and "Lady Girls"
Drama Special:
"Grill Room Investigation Special"
Movie:
"WOOD JOB!" (featuring English subtitles)
Variety Shows:
"The World Unknown to Matsuko" and "MOCO'S Kitchen"
For complete programming details, customers can visit the TV JAPAN website at www.tvjapan.net and download the TV JAPAN+ mobile application available free through the Apple iTunes Store and Google Play Marketplace.
TV JAPAN is available without a subscription during this special promotional period in select markets, courtesy of the operators listed below:

(*Special Offers, restrictions apply)

As a special incentive to subscribe, TV JAPAN is offering $25 gift cards or cash rebate to both new subscribers, as well as to those who refer-a-friend to subscribe to TV JAPAN . Customers can choose from gift cards from such merchants as Amazon, Starbucks and Bed, Bath and Beyond. In addition, TV JAPAN is also offering monthly drawings with a variety of prizes, including round trip airfare to Japan . Customers are eligible for these TV JAPAN giveaways October 1-December 31, 2015 . For Official Rules, qualifications, terms and conditions of this promotion, please visit www.tvjapancam.net
Media Contact:
Shelly Kurtz , International Media Distribution
